content: before marker k2tog p1 work next row of chart b in appropriate size p1 ssk k to end repeat rnds 2-3 until 62 74 sts rem rearrange sts centering the charted sts on n2 as follows n1 sole 30 36 stockinette sts n2 instep 30 36 charted sts plus 1 extra purl stitch on each side of the instep remove markers gusset two set up round with n1 pick up and knit 15 18 sts along slip_stitch edge of heel flap pick up and knit 1 st in between heel flap and instep place marker with n2 work row 6 of chart a in appropriate size pick up and knit 1 st in between instep and heel flap pick up and knit 15 18 sts along other slip_stitch edge of heel flap 80 96 sts n1 sole 34 41 sts n2 instep 46 55 sts note if you are using double pointed needles arrange the stitches to your liking round 1 k18 22 p13 16 k2tog p1 slm here and throughout work next row of chart a in appropriate size p1 ssk p13 16 round 2 and all even rounds k to 1 st before marker p1 work next row of chart a in appropriate size p1 k to end round 3 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog p1 work next row of chart a in appropriate size p1 ssk k to end © 2010 star athena - all rights reserved 4 http //keeponknittinginthefreeworld blogspot com/ repeat rnds 2-3 until 62 74 sts rem rearrange sts centering the charted sts on n2 as follows n1 sole 30 36 stockinette sts n2 instep 30 36 charted sts plus 1 extra purl stitch on each side of the instep remove markers foot one round 1 k30 36 p1 work next round of chart b in appropriate size p1 cont in est pattern alternating between chart a and chart b in appropriate sizes until 1 25 to tip of toe proceed to toe foot two round 1 k30 36 p1 work next round of chart a in appropriate size p1 cont in est pattern alternating between chart a and chart b in appropriate sizes until 1 5 to tip of toe proceed to toe toe set-up round k30 36 k1 ssk work in est pattern to last 3 sts k2tog k1 round 1 work even in pattern round 2 k1 ssk work in est pattern to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 twice round 3 work even in est pattern repeat rnds 2-3 until 32 44 sts remain next round k1 ssk k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 twice work this round 3 4 times until 20 28 sts remain you now have 10 14 sts on both needles break yarn leaving long enough strand to graft toe using kitchener stitch graft remaining stitches together finishing weave in all loose ends block as desired pattern originally appeared in knitscene fall 2009 many thanks to emily williams for modeling
